element.name: referenceFrame
element.label: Datum
element.description: The Coordinate Reference System (CRS) that should be used to interpret the longitude and latitude, e.g. WGS 84, NAD 83.

element.name: sml:onlineResource
element.label: Online Resource
element.description: Description of an Online Resource

element.name: xlink:href
element.label: URL
element.description: Network location of an online resource

element.name: xlink:href
element.label: URL
element.description: Network location of an online document

element.name: xlink:href
element.label: URL
element.description: Network location of a resource relating to contact information

element.name: swe:field_siteStatus
element.label: Current Site Status
element.description: The present operational status of the site. Select a value from the drop-down list

element.name: swe:field_observedBBOX
element.label: Observation Bounding Box
element.description: The bounding box within which the sensor site/platform observations have or will occur. Complete this section if the site/platform observation area is different than the site's central point location/centroid.

element.name: swe:field_sensorStatus
element.label: Current Sensor Status
element.description: The present operational status of the sensor. Select a value from the drop-down list

element.name: sml:member
element.label: Event
element.description: A significant event in the history of the site.

element.name: sml:classifier_siteEventType
element.label: Event Classifier
element.description: A classifier describing an historical event at the site.

element.name: sml:classifier_siteType
element.label: Site Type
element.description: The category of monitoring carried out at the site. Select a value from the drop-down list

element.name: sml:classifier_sensorType
element.label: Sensor Type
element.description: A category of sensor based on function. Select a value from the drop-down list

element.name: swe:coordinate_easting_site
element.label: Longitude
element.description: The longitude of the site's position in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_northing_site
element.label: Latitude
element.description: The latitude of the site's position in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: swe:coordinate_altitude_site
element.label: Altitude
element.description: The elevation of the site's position in metres relative to mean sea level

element.name: swe:coordinate_easting_sensor
element.label: Longitude
element.description: The longitude of the sensor's position in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_northing_sensor
element.label: Latitude
element.description: The latitude of the sensor's position in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: swe:coordinate_altitude_sensor
element.label: Altitude
element.description: The elevation of the sensor's position in metres relative to mean sea level

element.name: swe:coordinate_n_sensor
element.label: North Bound
element.description: Northern most coordinate of the limit of the sensor observation area, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: swe:coordinate_n_site
element.label: North Bound
element.description: Northern most coordinate of the limit of the site observation area, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: swe:coordinate_w_sensor
element.label: West Bound
element.description: Western most coordinate of the limit of the sensor observation area, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_w_site
element.label: West Bound
element.description: Western most coordinate of the limit of the site observation area, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_e_sensor
element.label: East Bound
element.description: Eastern most coordinate of the limit of the sensor observation area, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_e_site
element.label: East Bound
element.description: Eastern most coordinate of the limit of the site observation area, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: swe:coordinate_s_sensor
element.label: South Bound
element.description: Southern most coordinate of the limit of the sensor observation area, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: swe:coordinate_s_site
element.label: South Bound
element.description: Southern most coordinate of the limit of the site observation area, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: gml:timePosition
element.label: Metadata Effective Date
element.description: Enter the date on which the following information describing the site and its sensors became or will become valid. Insert date in YYYY-MM-DD format or use the calendar icon to select the date

element.name: sml:input_observedPhenomenon
element.label: Observed Phenomenon
element.description: A feature or phenomenon observed at the site or by the sensor.

element.name: sml:input
element.label: Observed Phenomenon
element.description: A feature or phenomenon observed at the site or by the sensor.

element.name: swe:ObservableProperty
element.label: Observable Property
element.description: A feature or phenomenon observed as an input to a sensor.

element.name: name
element.label: Event name
element.description: Name of the historical event

element.name: sml:member_siteOnlineResource
element.label: Document
element.description: Reference to document relating to the site usually via a URL

element.name: sml:member_document
element.label: Document
element.description: Reference to document usually via a URL

element.name: sml:keyword_siteKeyword
element.label: Keyword
element.description: Commonly used word(s), or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the sensor site. Keyword is a repeatable element; add as many keywords as necessary to describe the sensor site.

element.name: sml:keyword_sensorKeyword
element.label: Keyword
element.description: Commonly used word(s), or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the type and usage of the sensor. Keyword is a repeatable element; add as many keywords as necessary to describe the sensor.

element.name: sml:member_relatedDataset-GeoNetworkUUID
element.label: Related Dataset
element.description: UUID of related dataset

element.name: gml:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description of event

element.name: gml:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description of document

element.name: sml:identification_site
element.label: Site Identification
element.description: Information that identifies and classifies the sensor site or platform

element.name: sml:identification_sensor
element.label: Sensor Identification
element.description: Information that identifies and classifies a sensor

element.name: sml:EventList
element.label: Events
element.description: List of events from site history

element.name: sml:ClassifierList
element.label: Classifiers
element.description: List of classifier information about the site or sensor

element.name: sml:IdentifierList
element.label: Identifiers
element.description: List of identifier information about the site or sensor

element.name: sml:InputList
element.label: Inputs
element.description: List of inputs sensed at site or by sensor

element.name: sml:identifier_siteID
element.label: Site ID
element.description: A unique value for the respective Site ID Type

element.name: sml:identifier_siteShortName
element.label: Short Site Name
element.description: A short or abbreviated name for the sensor site/platform

element.name: sml:identifier_siteFullName
element.label: Full Site Name
element.description: A full descriptive name for the sensor site/platform

element.name: sml:identifier_GeoNetwork-UUID
element.label: Metadata Identifier
element.description: A unique value for the metadata record

element.name: sml:identifier_sensorShortName
element.label: Short Sensor Name
element.description: A short or abbreviated name for the sensor

element.name: sml:identifier_sensorFullName
element.label: Full Sensor Name
element.description: A full descriptive name for the sensor

element.name: sml:identifier_sensorIDType
element.label: Sensor ID Type
element.description: The type of identifier used to identify the sensor. Typically is or includes a reference to the authority managing the ID scheme, e.g. NAPS, Manufacturer Serial Number, Asset Management Number

element.name: sml:identifier_sensorID
element.label: Sensor ID
element.description: A unique value for the type of sensor ID specified

element.name: sml:identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: A unique value for the site/platform or sensor

element.name: sml:classification
element.label: Classifiers
element.description: List of classification values

element.name: sml:ClassifierList
element.label: Classifiers
element.description: List of classification values

element.name: sml:classifier
element.label: Classifier
element.description: Classification value

element.name: sml:contact
element.label: Contact Information
element.description: Details about the person or organization to be contacted for further information on the sensor deployment site/platform

element.name: sml:individualName
element.label: Individual Name
element.description: Name of the responsible person â€“ surname, given name, title, separated by a delimiter

element.name: sml:organizationName
element.label: Organization Name
element.description: Name of the responsible organization

element.name: sml:contactInfo
element.label: Contact Info
element.description: Contact Information Elements

element.name: sml:phone
element.label: Phone
element.description: Contact phone details (voice and facsimile)

element.name: sml:voice
element.label: Telephone Number
element.description: Telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

element.name: sml:facsimile
element.label: Fax Number
element.description: Telephone number of a fax machine for the responsible organization or individual

element.name: sml:address
element.label: Address
element.description: Address information

element.name: sml:deliveryPoint
element.label: Street Address
element.description: Enter the street address for the responsible organization or individual I.e. 123 Main St.

element.name: sml:city
element.label: City
element.description: City of the location

element.name: sml:administrativeArea
element.label: State
element.description: State or province of the location

element.name: sml:postalCode
element.label: Postal Code
element.description: Postal code or ZIP code

element.name: sml:country
element.label: Country
element.description: Country of the physical address

element.name: sml:DocumentList_documents
element.label: Site Documentation
element.description: List of documents relating to the site usually via URL

element.name: sml:DocumentList_datasets
element.label: Related Datasets
element.description: List of related datasets

element.name: sml:date
element.label: Date
element.description: The date of the site event. Enter in YYYY-MM-DD format or use the calendar icon to select the date

element.name: sml:location_site
element.label: Site Location / Centroid
element.description: The position of the site or the central point of the area where observations are made

element.name: sml:location_sensor
element.label: Sensor Location / Centroid
element.description: The position of the sensor (not needed if the sensor is located at a site or on a platform)

element.name: sml:electronicMailAddress
element.label: Email
element.description: Address of the electronic mailbox of the responsible organization or individual

element.name: gml:description_abstract
element.label: Note
element.description: Enter any additional descriptive or explanatory text about the site/platform or sensor

element.name: gml:description_siteOnlineResource
element.label: Description
element.description: Enter any additional descriptive or explanatory text about the document

element.name: sml:component
element.label: Sensor
element.description: Description of a sensor including: keywords, identifiers, classifiers, status, location and inputs

element.name: name
element.label: Sensor Name
element.description: Name of sensor component

element.name: xlink:href
element.label: Sensor Link
element.description: Link to sensorML component

element.name: sml:Component
element.label: Sensor
element.description: Metadata about a Sensor

element.name: sml:history
element.label: Site History
element.description: A record of significant events in the life of the monitoring site, including future-dated ones

element.name: sml:hoursOfService
element.label: Hours of Service
element.description: Provide a time period (including time zone) when an organization or individual can be contacted

element.name: sml:contactInstructions
element.label: Contact Instructions
element.description: Provide any additional instructions necessary for communicating with the contact

element.name: sml:positionName
element.label: Position Name
element.description: Role or position of the responsible person

element.name: sml:format
element.label: Format
element.description: Format of document
